track.name: Sweetest Thing
comments: ONE OF THE BEST BANDS......................ALL TIMES :)
Always will make me remember LOVE
written by Bono as an apology to his wife Ali Hewson for having to work in the studio on her birthday
Slightly disjointed, but passionate and joyful...in other words, an near exact emulation of love!
makes me smile,everytime i listen ..... thx U2!!!
♥ this is a blind kind of love ♥

"Blue-eyed boy meets a brown-eyed girl."
This goes into the record books of world-greatest song lyrics!
you know i got black eyes but they burn so brightly for her.
brown eyed girl meets blue eyed boy  °¿°
i like a dry kind of love
